paragraphs.body: I think we should add Next Nominations for like next month incase if there are user wanted to nominate that is getting ready to be gone for a few hours and didn't have time and wanted to get this really hurry. Who's with me? -- King Marth 64 (talk • other wikis • blogs) http://i1116.photobucket.com/albums/k576/DigiPen92/25px-Marthsprite.gif  http://i1116.photobucket.com/albums/k576/DigiPen92/Luigidance.gif 20:20, August 31, 2011 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: According to policy, when you "win" UotM, you aren't eligible to be nominated again for a whole year. I know we have the archives and it everyone could always go to that to see who isn't eligible to be nominated, but maybe it could be beneficial to have a small list of 12 users who aren't eligible to be nominated on the main page itself. Whenever an admin clears out the nomination then, they would just also removed the first name from the list and add the recent UotM to it, so it is clear for everyone to see who they can't nominate for the next month.
paragraphs.text: According to policy, when you "win" UotM, you aren't eligible to be nominated again for a whole year. I know we have the archives and it everyone could always go to that to see who isn't eligible to be nominated, but maybe it could be beneficial to have a small list of 12 users who aren't eligible to be nominated on the main page itself. Whenever an admin clears out the nomination then, they would just also removed the first name from the list and add the recent UotM to it, so it is clear for everyone to see who they can't nominate for the next month.
